name: SQLWorkloadGenerator
short_description:
SQL Workload Generator will generate data, populate tables, and then throw a user configurable workload against a given database.

The workload is generating orders for random customers and products.   

The data is purely random and the workload is largely spherical cows and frictionless plains.  That is its main purpose is to generate workload to tune against etc.   The data has no value or meaning and is very simplified.

Supports Postgres, Mysql, and DB2 UDB so far.
summary: Generates multiple concurrent database sessions of SQL traffic.
